Description: 1977 Greco "Lawsuit" Les Paul Standard type Guitar-(Has the Lawsuit Moustache Headstock) Made in Japan - It's seen plenty of use and has lots of dings, scratches, etc... Most noticeable would be that much of the finish is gone on the back of the neck - and there is one crack in the Top- Extends from Neck Pickup ring toward the Cutaway about 3/4 INch- It's been glued but is still noticeable - Also there are several places along the edges that are worn through - The Tuners are nice 70's nickel USA Grovers with Keystone buttons! and the neck position pickup has been changed to a Gibson P94, which sounds great! The bridge is the humbucker that came with it when I got it- I swapped out the magnet to an un-oriented Alnico 5 and it's pretty darned spanky! The toggle is changed to a switchcraft and the pots are CTS and Alpha I installed with orange drop caps for the tone controls- The input jack is also upgraded to a switchcraft. NOTE: This is One of the Japanese Greco's That besides having Gibson's Headstock shape, it also has the Gibson Style Truss Rod System and Rosewood Fingerboard! It's a Nice Neck!!! It's a semi hollow design and weighs in at 8.5 lbs. according to my bathroom scale This guitar plays really nice- Straight Neck with Recently Dressed frets that are smooth and play wonderfully - Action is set pretty low and she plays quick and nice all the way up the fretboard- No dead spots- She's a rocker!!! I was going to change out the nut and switch out the bridge to an ABR-1 to widen out the string spread a bit, to match up to the pickups poles better, but I didn't - Iit plays real nice with the original 'Bone' nut and original bridge- So I've just left it- Also it needs Strap Holders!!!... Them there's the 'Project" part for the new owner..... and if you cared to refinish it or what not- Comes with a nice 4 latch Arched top lid Epiphone Hardshell Case- Really Nice Case!!! it's a bit larger than a les paul case- (I think it may be an ES-339 Case...???) Nice vintage Japanese Lawsuit era Les Paul- I'm sure I will miss her......... Sold absolutely "AS-IS" No Returns!!!!! $65.00 Shipping for Extremely well packed Delivery in the upper 48 States - USA Shipping ONLY.....
Title: 1977 Greco Les Paul Standard Guitar-"Lawsuit" Gibson P94- Nice Playing Project!!
